description: Sadamura is a photographer. He tries to get an arrangement with http://anidb.net/ch5903 [Abuto] about making a photo shooting with the rising star http://anidb.net/ch40719 [Sannou Yoriko]; when Abuto`s new assistant http://anidb.net/ch5907 [Heguri Kiriko] enters the room he shows a certain interest about her as well.
name: Sadamura
